channel.title: Server Help
channel.description:
1.How do I take a shop from 1 server and put on another ? 2.When I attack anything they spaz out n when they lose all their life it just comes back how do I get them to die and drop stuff n spawn?
3.How do I get something to spawn (items)? 4.How do I make commands? 5.How do I take anything from another server and use it on a different one Based on Svenscap3pk V2 Sum1 help
If u help ill make you a MOD

item.title: Server Help
item.dc:creator: @boomer216 boomer216
item.description:
@boomer216 wrote:

These have nothing to do with Melissaâ€™s server. They are basic server questions. Change the title and you may get more help.

1.How do I take a shop from 1 server and put on another ? - Open shops.cfg and copy the shop into your shops.cfg
2.When I attack anything they spaz out n when they lose all their life it just comes back how do I get them to die and drop stuff n spawn? - No Idea.

3.How do I get something to spawn (items)? - Tutorials.
4.How do I make commands? - Tutorials.
5.How do I take anything from another server and use it on a different one - Common Sense

Read full topic
